cloud_connect_pop_configure_description: To configure your PoP, you will need to select your L2 or L3 network connection model
cloud_connect_pop_add_configuration_succ: Adding PoP configuration. Click here to view its status.
cloud_connect_network_address_invalid_me: Enter a valid IPv4 block with the range 30 (e.g. 10.1.250.4/30).
cloud_connect_asn_helper: Positive non null number outside of 65501
cloud_connect_pop_add_configuration_sele: The providerâ€™s service can only have an L3 PoP configuration
cloud_connect_network_address_popover: A size /30 IPv4 block, used for the link between your router and the OVHcloud Connect router situated in the PoP.
cloud_connect_asn_client_popover: Your AS BGP number, which is configured on your router situated in the PoP.
cloud_connect_asn_ovh_popover: The OVHcloud AS number that will be configured on the OVHcloud Connect routers situated in the PoP.
